name: RDVA Virtual Assistant
description: At RDVA we offer a wide variety of services to many different types of businesses. Due to limited space, budget or volume of work you may be in a position where you are focused on day-to-day tasks rather than delivering your skills and expertise to your clients. Thatâ€™s where we come in. From our own fully equipped offices, we work with a variety of clients from various sectors helping them in their businesses on an ad-hoc, regular or project basis.
